body_html:
Roy, could you change the codegen so that we have a way to map between c++ enum and Python strings? I would love to see such a change :)
…

body:
Roy, could you change the codegen so that we have a way to map between c++
enum and Python strings? I would love to see such a change :)

On Wed, Jun 6, 2018 at 03:48 Adam Paszke <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Strings aren’t ideal, but they’re better than enums. I would be ok with
> that
>
